function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Vulnerable older persons facing challenges in accessing medical treatments and health care services for non-COVID ailments and chronic diseases.","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to COVID-19 and serious illness.","Mitigation":"Improved access to healthcare services and medical treatments for older persons.","Technologies":"Healthcare infrastructure and telemedicine services.","People":"Older persons and those with underlying medical conditions.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations and government health departments."},{"Description":"Isolation and limited mobility of older people living alone creating greater risks.","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to COVID-19 and other health risks.","Mitigation":"Social support programs and mobility assistance for older persons.","Technologies":"Telecare systems and community support networks.","People":"Older people living alone.","Owner":"Community support organizations and government social welfare departments."},{"Description":"Increased barriers for individuals living with disabilities in accessing mobility, health services, and appropriate communication.","Impact":"Heightened vulnerability and lack of essential support for individuals with disabilities.","Mitigation":"Accessibility improvements and inclusive health services for individuals with disabilities.","Technologies":"Accessibility technologies and inclusive design practices.","People":"Individuals living with disabilities.","Owner":"Government disability support agencies and organizations advocating for disability rights."},{"Description":"Governance efficiency and quality being put to the test during the pandemic.","Impact":"Public dependency on governments for security and support during public health crises.","Mitigation":"Transparent and responsive governance, effective crisis management strategies.","Technologies":"Digital governance tools and communication platforms.","People":"General population relying on government support.","Owner":"Government leadership and public administration."}]}
